ruling: - When this card inflicts Battle Damage to the opponent it is halved, regardless if it was a direct attack, or from an attack against another monster. For example, if your [[Susa Soldier]] (ATK 2000) attacks the opponent's [[Gemini Elf]] (ATK 1900), the opponent will take 50 points of Battle Damage. The damage points are rounded up when there is a fraction.
